headline: Should the Harris Blitzer Sports Partnership Reshape Global Payments' (GPN) Strategic Focus on Large Venues?
summary: Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment recently announced a multi-year global partnership naming Global Payments as the Official Payment Technology Provider for the Prudential Center, the New Jersey Devils, and the Philadelphia 76ers, integrating its solutions across ticketing, concessions, and in-venue operations. This collaboration highlights Global Payments’ continued focus on expanding its core commerce offerings and strengthening its presence in large-scale entertainment and sports...
